name: Publero
tag_list: online, distribution, magazines, newspaper, ipad, android, newsstand
overview: The company Publero is an online press distributor. Publero provides publishers with a comprehensive range of services for the digital publishing of titles on the Internet. The portal enables the display of the title, securing payments, subscriptions, sales statistics and billing in compliance with EU legislation. Portal users will be given the opportunity of reading newspapers and magazines both online and offline. The company emphasizes the active promotion of the portal Publero.com. The goal is gaining new users - readers using new internet marketing tools and joint strategies with vendors of goods and services beyond the Internet. The publisher may release a title even beyond the portal Publero.com under his own brand, on his portal and using the services of the company Publero for providing the technical operation. The technical concept of the portal Publero.com allows the use of any authorized distribution and sharing of printed materials on the Internet. The company has the ambition to be no.1 in the Czech Republic and to start operating even beyond the Czech Republic. However, the necessary funding for expansion to other countries has not yet been provided.
